title: Will to Survive: Love in the Line of Duty
description: Former Marine David Langley is devoted to his career as a narcotics detective. But when Langley answers the call to help a fellow officer, the resulting catastrophe brings an unforeseen element crashing into his life--love. When Detective Langley seeks out the mysterious woman who saved his life, he doesn't realize that getting personal with her could inadvertently blow the largest drug investigation in the history of the Brookside Police Department.Jenna's life turned upside down after an abrupt end to her military career. With her brother's support, she is almost back on her feet. That is, until she finds herself thrust into the world of law enforcement--a world her family detests. But Jenna can't deny the connection she felt with the cop who almost died in her arms.As Langley and Jenna struggle to navigate their conflicting loyalties, can their feelings of love survive?
author: M. Leann
